verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Elim \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w*,\f + \fr 16:1 \ft The geographical name Sin is related to Sinai and should not be mistaken for the English word sin.\f* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* between Elim \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w grumbled|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron.

“\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*!” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*. “\w There|strong="H3427"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w pots|strong="H5518"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ate \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H7648"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* starve \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* \w down|strong="H4305"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w Each|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* enough \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w test|strong="H5254"\w* \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w instructions|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w what|strong="H3559"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w twice|strong="H4932"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w much|strong="H4932"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H4932"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w grumbling|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w grumble|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w added|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H7646"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* grumbling \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w grumblings|strong="H8519"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Aaron, “\w Tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w Come|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* grumbling.’”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* Aaron \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w toward|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w*.
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* grumbling \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, ‘\w At|strong="H3478"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w* \f + \fr 16:12 \ft Hebrew Between the two evenings\f* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.’”

\w That|strong="H1961"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w quail|strong="H7958"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w in|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w layer|strong="H7902"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w layer|strong="H7902"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* had \w evaporated|strong="H5927"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H2009"\w* \w thin|strong="H1851"\w* flakes \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* floor, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w fine|strong="H1851"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w frost|strong="H3713"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*?” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* told \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: ‘\w Each|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w much|strong="H6310"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* needs. \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w omer|strong="H6016"\w* \f + \fr 16:16 \ft An omer is approximately 2 dry quarts or 2.2 liters; also in verses 18, 32, 33, and 36.\f* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* tent.’”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*. Some \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* some \w less|strong="H4591"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7235"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w it|strong="H4058"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4058"\w* \w omer|strong="H6016"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w had|strong="H7235"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w excess|strong="H5736"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w little|strong="H4591"\w* \w had|strong="H7235"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* shortfall.\f + \fr 16:18 \ft Cited in 2 Corinthians 8:15\f* \w Each|strong="H4058"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w as|strong="H7235"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w as|strong="H7235"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* needed \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w eat|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*, “\w No|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* keep \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w part|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w became|strong="H7107"\w* infested \w with|strong="H5921"\w* maggots \w and|strong="H4872"\w* began \w to|strong="H5704"\w* smell. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* each \w one|strong="H6310"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w much|strong="H6310"\w* \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w was|strong="H8121"\w* needed, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w when|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w grew|strong="H2552"\w* \w hot|strong="H2552"\w*, \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* \w away|strong="H4549"\w*. The Sabbath Observed (Genesis 2:1–3; Hebrews 4:1–11)

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w twice|strong="H8147"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w much|strong="H4932"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*—\w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w omers|strong="H6016"\w* per person \f + \fr 16:22 \ft 2 omers is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters per person.\f*—\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*, “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: ‘\w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w complete|strong="H7677"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w bake|strong="H1310"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* want \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bake|strong="H1310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* want \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w boil|strong="H1310"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w set|strong="H3240"\w* aside \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* remains \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H4931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.’”
